original_text: And behold, some men were bringing on a bed a man who was paralyzed, and they were seeking to bring him in and lay him before Jesus,
korean_text: 한 중풍병자를 사람들이 침상에 메고 와서 예수 앞에 들여놓고자 하였으나

sentences.original_text: some men were bringing on a bed
sentences.korean_translation: 몇 사람들이 침상에 한 사람을 메고 오고 있었다

sentences.original_text: and they were seeking to bring him in
